projects.name: Air Corsica - DevX Platform Engineering
projects.description: Modernized developer experience and transactional security for airline booking platform through GitHub Actions CI/CD ecosystem, hands-on mentoring, and resilient NestJS/RabbitMQ proxy architecture.
highlights: Reduction of deployment time by 80% (from ~2 days manual work to <30 minutes fully automated) via reusable GitHub Actions workflows with canary deployments and automated rollbacks
Increase in release frequency by 5x (from monthly to weekly feature releases) through implementation of Cloud Native principles, ensuring staging/production parity

Improvement of transaction reliability to 99.9% uptime with 90% fewer third-party failures by architecting NestJS proxy with RabbitMQ, implementing circuit breakers, retry policies, and idempotency guarantees

Reduction of new developer onboarding time by 70% (from multiple days to <1 day productivity) through standardization of workflows, creation of living style guides, and automation of dependency updates
Mentoring of distributed team (in-house + contractors) on Clean Architecture and SOLID principles via weekly workshops, elevating code quality and establishing unit-test coverage thresholds
Deployment of resilient microservice in Docker with OpenTelemetry monitoring, Datadog integration, and zero-downtime health checks for critical booking/payment flows

projects.name: Critical Infrastructure IoT Gateway Platform
projects.description: High-performance IoT gateway for global smart infrastructure SaaS provider, unifying heterogeneous device integration across data centers and smart buildings with Redis-backed resilience, automated CI/CD, and OpenTelemetry observability.
highlights: Achievement of 99.99% production uptime by implementing Redis caching, edge queueing, and automatic retry strategies with exponential backoff
Reduction of data loss incidents by 85% through resilient fallback mechanisms that buffer messages during SaaS platform outages
Acceleration of new device onboarding by 81% (from 3 weeks to 4 days) via centralized decoders, schema-based validation, and normalized payload pipeline
Scaling to handle 10x traffic increase (100K+ events/minute per gateway) without additional hardware through worker pools and optimized in-memory caching
Reduction of deployment cycle time by 70% with GitLab CI automation integrating unit, integration, and E2E tests plus canary releases and staged rollouts
Construction of unified REST API with OpenAPI specification for device lifecycle management, enabling remote registration, updates, and real-time monitoring
Integration of OpenTelemetry for full observability with logs, metrics, and alerting tied to device health and data flow KPIs

projects.name: TestUnMetier - CTO Accompaniment
projects.description: Two-phase strategic consulting engagement for a career guidance platform: comprehensive IT audit followed by monthly CTO accompaniment covering product roadmap, technical recruitment, and infrastructure/security vendor management.
highlights: Conduction of 1-week IT audit analyzing application architecture, development processes, and team organization, identifying 12 priority improvement areas that reduced technical risk by 60%
Structuring of interviews with 8 stakeholders (product, project, tech leads) to map system dependencies and bottlenecks, reducing feature delivery timelines by ~40%
Development of 5 technical job descriptions aligned with product strategy, accelerating recruitment process from 3 months to 6 weeks and improving candidate-role fit by 45%
Definition of 12-month technical roadmap prioritizing 15+ initiatives by business impact and feasibility, aligning tech investments with growth objectives (+30% target user increase)
Management of relationships with 3 external vendors (cloud infrastructure, security assurance), negotiating SLAs guaranteeing 99.5% uptime and reducing infrastructure costs by ~25%
Establishment of technical governance framework (monthly committees, velocity KPIs, quality dashboards) improving team visibility and reducing time-to-market by 35%

projects.name: Tekkare - Technical Mentoring & Architectural Bootstrap
projects.description: Hands-on mentorship of development team for technical services management platform, accelerating their skill growth in GraphQL/modern backend API architecture and optimizing development practices.
highlights: Reduction of new feature development time by 40% through optimized GraphQL architecture with NestJS, replacing multiple REST endpoints with unified, type-safe queries
Acceleration of new developer onboarding from ~2 weeks to ~5 days via living architectural documentation, reusable patterns, and annotated code examples
Improvement of code maintainability by 50% by implementing Clean Architecture and SOLID principles with clear layer separation (domain, application, infrastructure)
Optimization of database query performance by 60% (from ~800ms to ~300ms average) through Postgres ORM optimization, strategic indexing, and N+1 query resolution
Establishment of quality pipeline with automated testing (unit, integration, E2E) reducing production regressions by 70% and increasing deployment confidence
Mentoring of team on GraphQL best practices (dataloaders, pagination, error handling) and NestJS patterns via pair programming and structured code reviews

projects.name: Atlas des RÃ©gions Naturelles (ARN) - Backend Architecture
projects.description: Designed and developed backend architecture for the ARN photographic archive platform, documenting 15,000+ images of French landscapes and buildings through an optimized NestJS/Laravel stack focused on performance and scalability.
highlights: Architecting of photo archive platform managing 15,000+ high-resolution images with multi-criteria filtering (region, typology, materials, period), ensuring <300ms response time and 99.9% uptime
Implementation of hybrid categorization system with full-text indexing handling 10,000+ daily search queries with geographic, thematic, and historical navigation
Optimization of image processing pipeline reducing upload and thumbnail generation time by 60% (from ~5min to ~2min per batch of 50 images) through parallelization and smart compression
Design of unified REST/GraphQL API with distributed caching cutting server load by 70% and enabling integration with physical exhibitions and printed publications
Deployment of cloud-native infrastructure with geographically distributed CDN reducing bandwidth costs by 40% while improving international load times by 55%
Establishment of CI/CD pipeline with automated testing ensuring metadata quality (geolocation, regional taxonomy) and reducing cataloging errors by 80%

Acceleration of developer onboarding x2 faster (from ~3 weeks to 1.5 weeks) via unified project templates, automated setup scripts, and common tooling across European locations
Reduction of post-release bug rate by 30% after implementing standardized QA workflows and cross-country DevOps pipelines using Docker, GitLab CI, and ArgoCD
Improvement of developer satisfaction by 35% on internal surveys regarding architecture clarity and tooling through architecture clinics, workshops, and documentation

Mentoring of distributed teams remotely across multiple European countries, establishing shared technical language and unified engineering culture that scaled seamlessly through Tekoway's evolution into Eukles

Creation of multi-stack project boilerplates integrating DDD folder structures, dependency injection, logging, monitoring, and observability hooks for consistent delivery quality regardless of team location
